titleStmt.title: An answer to divers scandals mentioned in a certain pamphlet, entituled, The humble remonstrance of Sr. Iohn Stawell. Written by John Ashe Esquire, 1654.
titleStmt.author: Ashe, John, Esquire.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Newcomb, dwelling in Thamestreet, over against Baynards Castle,

notesStmt.note: An answer to Stawell, John. To the supreme authority the Parliament of the Common-wealth of England, his excellency the Lord General Cromwell, and his Councell of Officers: the humble remonstrance of Sir John Stawell.
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.
